thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Jennifer Yanaga
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Jennifer Yanaga

author: Jennifer Yanaga
title: Jennifer Yanaga
text:
I could not find my last purchases. Your website has too many pop ups, and is not as easy to navigate. For instance, your site did not ask me for my VIP number right away. That would have probably assisted me with reviewing past purchases so I could have made a more intelligent purchase.
Disappointed for sure.
